allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add D&D image generator design document

Design for hybrid CLI/MCP image generation system using DALL-E 3:
- Category-aware prompts (spell schools, item types)
- Batch generation with resumable state
- MCP integration for manual control via Claude Code
- Organized output structure for frontend integration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

)")
Bash(for entity_type in feats item_types languages sizes spell_schools)
Bash(for entity_type in ability_scores item_properties item_types sizes spell_schools damage_types sources)

Bash(for race in dwarf-mountain elf-drow-dark elf-high elf-wood gnome-forest gnome-rock half-elf-aquatic-elf-ancestry half-elf-drow-dark-elf-ancestry half-elf-high-elf-ancestry half-elf-wood-elf-ancestry halfling-ghostwise halfling-lightfoot halfling-stout human-variant tiefling-variants)

Bash(for entity_type in spells items classes races backgrounds monsters feats item_types languages sizes spell_schools ability_scores conditions damage_types item_properties proficiency_types skills sources)
